programme.title: The A to Z of TV Gardening

programme.title: Impossible

programme.title: Unbeatable

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Mountain Gorilla
programme.sub-title: Last Stand of the Silverback King
programme.desc: Patrick Stewart narrates a landmark three-part series on the worlds last mountain gorillas. Titus the gorilla king faces the biggest challenge of his life. Hes lived longer and sired more offspring than any other known gorilla, but his time as a great leader may be coming to an end. The mighty silverback has a little orphan in his care - and both their lives hang in the balance.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Today, Flog It! comes from Penrhyn Castle in north Wales. Antiques expert David Harper looks at some vintage World War II posters, and Claire Rawle is surprised by a valuable watch that was found in the bottom of a book bag. Presenter Paul Martin goes under a mountain to look at Britain?s biggest water-powered generator.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Ben Robinson makes an amazing discovery at Norfolks impressive Holkham estate - its lost medieval village, seen for the first time since its disappearance some 200 years ago. The current village was once owned by Thomas William Coke, known as Coke of Norfolk, who was one of the great farming reformers of his time, instrumental in the agricultural revolution.

programme.desc: Scooby and the Mystery Inc. gang meet Wanda Sykes who is helping save a bunch of cute fuzzy animals up for adoption. When a marble statue comes to life at a museum in Greece our gang is caught between a braying minotaur and a sword-wielding Wonder Woman!

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: Large Dragon at Large; Uncle Scooby and Antarctica
programme.desc: Mystery solving adventures with Fred, Velma, Daphne, Shaggy and Scooby.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.sub-title: Mysteries on the Disorient Express; Worst in Show
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and his friends hit the road in the Mystery Machine after high school ends to live it up one last summer before adulthood.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: A Moveable Mystery!; The Feast of Dr. Frankenfooder!
programme.desc: When Scooby-Doo and the gang are on the trail of a monstrous gargoyle in the nighttime city of Paris, theyre stumped and need help solving the mystery. / Shaggy and Scooby are excited to visit a haunted castle in Germany.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: Mystery solving adventures with Fred, Velma, Daphne, Shaggy and Scooby.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.sub-title: Where Theres a Will, Theres a Wraith
programme.desc: A wealthy man whose life Scooby once saved writes Scooby into his will; however, to collect their share of the fortune, Scooby and the gang must spend a night in a creepy mansion with the mans kooky relatives and a spooky phantom.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: A rowdy Orc biker gang has decided to roll through Crystal Cove and no one is very happy about it, especially Fred, who freaks out when Daphne gets a crush on their leader, Odnarb, while he and Daphne are out on their first date.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: "Jeopardy!" host Alex Trebek quizzes contestants Velma, Shaggy and Andy the Brain Bot, who threatens to destroy everything.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: The gang investigate a mysterious `Dreamweaver who is appearing in the dreams of prominent Crystal Cove residents with disastrous results.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo, Where Are You!
programme.desc: The Scooby gang investigate the strange appearance of a phantom at a TV show when the studio safe is robbed and the station manager is kidnapped.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: A Terrifying Round With a Menacing, Metallic Clown
programme.desc: Shaggy competes in a mini-golf tournament that is terrorised by a giant metallic clown.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: When Scooby Doo and the gang are on the trail of a monstrous gargoyle in the nighttime city of Paris, Velma turns to close friend and famous fashion model Gigi Hadid, who is in Paris for work.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne always dreamed of meeting extra terrestrial life, but that dream becomes a nightmare when the gang gets caught up in the mystery of a scary alien monster!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo, Where Are You!
programme.desc: While boating, dense fog causes the gang to land on a mysterious haunted island where they investigate the legend of Vasquez the Pirates buried treasure.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: The mystery comes to a close as the gang finally gets to the bottom of what happened to the original Mystery Incorporated gang and why they disappeared. The truth, however, is not without its price. A monster known as The Freak Of Crystal Cove is determined to stop our heroes. Even if he has to bring the caves beneath Crystal Cove down on top of them he will do it to preserve his secret.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.sub-title: Bear Scents; Bear Luck; Magnetic Bear
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky Lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: All the Mushables have fun zooming down a long mudslide except Chep, who just cant get up the courage to do it. / When Mush-Mush and Chep lose Lilits flying disc down a snake tunnel, he is confident he can get it back.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Race The Beast; Surprise, Its Spring; The Missing Mushlet; The Hero Trap
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his best friends Chep and Lilit have all kinds of adventures in the forest. They are the protectors of the forest and they all have a unique power.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Flower; The Flower; The Phone; The Job
programme.desc: Gumball has a penchant for getting into trouble, but he never learns his lesson. Gumballs best friend is a fish named Darwin, who used to be the family pet until he grew legs and became part of the family.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball has a penchant for getting into trouble, but he never seems to learn his lesson. Gumballs best friend is a fish named Darwin, who used to be the family pet until he grew legs and became part of the family.

programme.title: Prince Ivandoe
programme.sub-title: The Prince and the Heroic Hooded Hermit; The Prince and The Three-Headed Knight; The Prince and The Doomy Loom Of Destiny; The Prince and The Scrawny
programme.desc: Ivandoe is the young prince of the forest. His father sends him on a quest for the magical Golden Feather of the fearsome Eagle King. Ivandoe and his dedicated team, including a small bird named Bert, discover new and mysterious areas of the forest.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Allergy; The Law; The Move; The Boss
programme.desc: Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he cant stop. Gumball jaywalks and is pulled over by Donut Cop. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. Gumball and Darwin help Rocky land an office job so that his dad, Mr Robinson, will be proud of him.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Responsible; The Quest; The Fight; The Treasure

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Shell; The Procrastinators; The Password; The Mothers
programme.desc: While performing a school play, Gumball is so nervous about kissing Penny that he accidentally head-butts her and cracks open her shell. Gumball and Darwin are offended when Mom calls them procrastinators, once shes told them what it means. Mum has forced Dad to install a password on the computer. Its Mothers Day and Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias and Banana Joe have both made a card for The Best Mum in the World.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Man; The Bros; The Burden; The Mirror
programme.desc: Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it. When Darwin and Gumball reveal how theyd spend their perfect day, Gumball confesses that he would spend it with Penny. Vice Principal Brown gives Gumball and Darwin the ancient school hamster, Chris Morris, to look after for the weekend. Gumball receives a scare-email from a freaky ghost and decides to ignore it, despite Darwins advice.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Question; The Butterfly; The Lie; The Pizza
programme.desc: After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Saint; The Friend; The Safety; The Oracle
programme.desc: Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. Anais throws a party but no one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Nobody; The Countdown; The Spoiler; The Society
programme.desc: Things keep going missing in the house, so its up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit. Gumball and Darwin hit snooze too many times on their alarm clock and miss the school bus. Gumball and Darwin want to see the scariest film of the year. Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Money; The Triangle; The Egg; The Downer
programme.desc: Richard has lost all of the familys money. Nicole is happy for the Wattersons to appear in a Joyful Burger commercial for some much needed cash. Darwin joins the school marching band, and his tin-whistle talent lands him the solo. Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket. Gumball refuses to get out of bed because he is in a lousy mood.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Others; The Crew; The Nemesis; The Return
programme.desc: When Anais reveals that shes in the grade above them at school, Gumball and Darwins eyes are suddenly opened to a whole new world of other students at Elmore Junior High. When Gumball and Darwin decide its time they join a crew, they agree that the coolest posse in Elmore is the Senior Citizens. Gumball and Darwin discover that Rob, who once swore to wreak vengeance on them, has been trying to destroy them for some time.

programme.title: One Zoo Three

programme.title: The Dengineers
programme.desc: Nine-year-old Kiran is a big fan of a certain boy wizard and a bit like his hero, hes had his life turned upside down. He recently changed schools, moved miles away from all his friends and he hasnt complained once. Thats because Kiran helps look after his mum, who has a disability which means she has trouble moving around. His mums condition meant they needed to be nearer to family.

programme.title: Absolute Genius Super Tech with Dick and Dom
programme.desc: Dick and Dom look to the stars and reveal three geniuses whose technology ideas have pioneered space travel. The boys go to NASA to see where real astronauts train before going to space, meet the man who sent the Rover to Mars, and get to drive a real space vehicle.

programme.title: Operation Ouch! Hospital Takeover
programme.desc: The doctors reveal what makes us flexible as they test the strength of a tendon to the max. They find out what its like to be an air ambulance pilot in Operation Takeover and Dr Xand uncovers if laughter really is the best medicine.

programme.title: Shark Bites
programme.desc: Steve Backshall meets a shark that is the master of moves. The Caribbean reef shark has lightning-quick reaction times and is one seriously flexible fish. Steve heads to the Bahamas in the Caribbean to swim alongside them.

programme.desc: Justin and his friends go on a treasure hunt. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble has baked a cake for Aunt Pollys birthday, but the cake ends up having an adventure all of its own.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies feel tired after doing keep fit exercises but they are ready for action again after eating lots of tubby custard. In Tummy Tales, a child keeps fit on a beach.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome babies Bella, Olive, Jack, Isobel, Jonas, Leo and their grown-ups. Inside everyones bags are soft toys which are explored through discovery, play, song and story. The popular song `Old McDonald had a farm features, as does a story involving Baby Bear.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: Maddie, an adventurous youngster who happens to be visually impaired, sets out with her best doggy friend Triggs to discover the music and adventure in the sounds of the world around them.

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Dylan imagines hes a hair stylist wants to give his client a new hairstyle theyll love, but getting it just right is a harder than he thought.

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: Lou sings a song about a flower, but Kiris big pet rock Rockaroonie is rolling down the hill towards him. Can Kiri stop the rock in time?

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Mum get into a debate with Dad about the definition of teasing. As they recall all the times hes been a big teaser, Dad argues that he was only playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.sub-title: The Days of the Week Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are excited to learn that Mr Wobbly, the jelly juggler, is coming to town, and they cant wait to see him. When they become impatient, Duggee explains to them that the week will fly by and that theres lots to be done in that time.

programme.title: Hey Duggees Squirrel Club
programme.desc: Duggee teaches Naughty Monkey how to calm down, and Professor Jeanie teaches perspective.

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits Theatre, its the spectacular acrobatic grapes working together to perform the most difficult structures to perfection.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Timmy and his friends all make animal masks to wear. Timmy makes a dinosaur mask, puts it on, and roars like a T-Rex. He loves his mask and wont take it off.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Its the start of a new day, and Wren has made a card for her best friend Emmy. Outside, Wren, Emmy and Ayat discover a ladybird, which soon flies away. They go in search of their new fluttery friend, but will they be able to find it? Later, its Solomons turn to sit at the VIP table as he has been doing so well at school, and he chooses Lusungu as his guest. Finally, Sophie has a fun activity for Wren, Solomon and Lusungu. Theyre going on a pretend train trip in search of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Big Cook Little Cook
programme.desc: Jen has brought in the board game snakes and ladders but has lost the dice. Camar the crocodile comes to visit, Small whizzes off to see how courgettes grow, and the two chefs make courgette crocodile for their snappy guest.

programme.title: Go Wild
programme.sub-title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie: Mandrill and Sand Lizard
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet some colourful characters - the amazing mandrills, which are the largest species of monkey in the world. They get close enough to see the beautiful blue and red faces of the males. Next, Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet sand lizards. They are surrounded by many females, who blend in perfectly with their sandy home, as well as some colourful males, who are much easier to spot.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?
programme.desc: Award-winning hairdresser Charlotte tells us why she loves using her Afro comb to style peoples hair.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Meagaidh the Border Collie is a search and rescue dog who works with her owner Tom. Her supernose follows scents and smells like clues, so they can rescue people who need their help. Meagaidh and Tom are visiting a school to show the children how a search and rescue dog works. They demonstrate some of their equipment, including Meagaidhs special doggy goggles, which she wears to keep the wind and dust out of her eyes when shes in the helicopter.

programme.title: Maddies Do You Know?
programme.sub-title: Metal Recycling Centre and Road Sign
programme.desc: Maddie is learning about metal, and how it can be recycled. Maddie visits a recycling centre where they recycle metal from old cars. She uses her special cameras to help us see how the cranes pick up, move and crush the cars into small pieces.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `digger and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different diggers: a driving digger, a dumping digger and a dizzy digger. Theres a muddy digger, a dozing digger and even a disco digger.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: The Numberblocks play an exciting game of bounce-ball and its the Even Tops versus the Odd Blocks. Learn about odd and even numbers with the Numberblocks.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: CH and SH go head-to-head in the Alphablocks Games and pit a ship and a shop against a chip and a chop.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: Again asks Arty to create some stripy patterns for his bouncy castle.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Green is surprised when Black and White arrive in her forest. Learn about light and dark colours with the Colourblocks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee hosts a reunion for the first ever Squirrels he looked after. However, the first ever Squirrels are older now and very similar to the parents. Does that mean when the Squirrels are bigger they will be old too.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: Stripes and Toad see a beautiful sunrise and decide to write a song about it together, but Stripes wants the song to be rocky, while Toad wants it to be slower. When they fall out and go off to write their own songs separately, Yukee tries to help them become friends again and create one song together.

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Down on the river, Justin and his friends learn to paddle a bell boat and have a sing song. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble joins Fisherman Tumble by the water as they go duck spotting.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies do running races and they each have a chance to win. When the Tubby Phone rings, theres a race to reach it before the tubby phone dance.

programme.title: Andys Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: When the museums prized prehistoric tumbleweed goes missing, Andy heads back 85 million years in time to try and find some more. During his search he helps a mother dinosaur protect her nest and manages to get himself covered in dino snot!

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Dougs mum, Zoe, brings surprises for the Brooklyn-Bells, but Waffle is sad because Doug is going to stay with her for a few days. Mrs Hobbs watches Waffle with new spy equipment.

programme.title: Topsy and Tim
programme.desc: The twins camping trip doesnt quite go as planned when Topsy is rushed to hospital for an operation. While Topsy is recuperating, Tim realises his eyesight is not as good as it should be, so Mummy arranges for him to have an eye test.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. Its great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Cosmo-players land on a playground planet where they learn how to play the Balloon-Crawler, but before they can play, they have to help an inhabitant learn to fly.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: The Octonauts expand their exploration beyond the sea - and onto land. With new rides and new friends, they are prepared to protect any habitats and animals at risk on land or under the water.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: When the buggy gets a flat tyre Dad, Cosima and Big Lizard are stranded. Big Lizards playful nature helps reveal a creative solution to their problem.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Supertato, the worlds first potato superhero as he tackles the mischievous Evil Pea, in the supermarket aisles.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Norrie is upset when she sees a leaf fall from the tree. She thinks its broken. She soon cheers up when she finds out that some trees shed their leaves in autumn, and actually its quite good fun playing and jumping in piles of leaves. But ouch! What has Roly found?

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Wriggly Worms
programme.desc: When Peter makes a rash promise to appease an angry Tommy Brock, he and his friends find themselves worming for their lives.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Its Silas and his classmates first full day at school! There are lots of things to explore, new friends to make and teachers to meet. After meeting the teachers, the children explore the classroom and outdoor area. At lunchtime, Ottilie and Bryn spot an invisible mouse in the dining hall. Lusungu finds that opening yogurt lids can be a bit tricky.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Ted the bus wants to be faster, and Mojo swops every top trying to make it happen. But its Bos homemade rocket that gives Ted the boost he needs- all the way into space!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey teaches Bingo how to use magic so she can make Mum play with her, but she forgets to explain the most important rule: never use magic for cheekiness.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Mum and Dad have a disagreement, Bluey makes Dad write a love letter to Mum to make up. Now Bluey must find a way to deliver the letter to Mum.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: The Piripenguins are annoyed to find that their holiday home has been double-booked by penguin nemesis Millie the Squid. With both refusing to move, is a resolution possible?

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: Dodge has to learn to work with Tiny after Miss Collie mixes up the pups usual groups.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Its Waffles last day at the Brooklyn-Bells but he still finds time to upset neighbour Mrs Hobbs. Simon hears Waffle speak. Will he finally agree that the family can keep the special dog?

programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.desc: When Otto, Oona and Isabelle fly around the island to get some materials for the Hoots log, Isabelles position as top flyer is challenged.

programme.sub-title: Autumn: Its Time for a Harvest Festival
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran join Julie at the farm for the harvest festival. Julie gives JoJo, Gran Gran and their friends a special tractor ride to the harvesting field, where theres lots for everyone to do.

programme.title: Moon and Me
programme.desc: Today, Moon Baby is going to visit Mr Onions bridge. Mr Onion is very excited while waiting for his friend. When Moon Baby arrives, Mr Onion hurries to meet him - but where has Moon Baby gone?

programme.title: The Clangers
programme.desc: It is Grannys birthday and all the Clangers are planning their presents for her. Small asks Major Clanger if he can help him invent something for her but Major says his work is too difficult for such a young Clanger. Small decides to invent something himself, something which involves puffballs, airfruit and three extremely acrobatic - or should we say aerobatic - froglets.

programme.title: In the Night Garden
programme.desc: A mysterious jet of water, a tiddle, appears suddenly next to Igglepiggle. He discovers that he can control it by stamping his feet. Delighted, he takes it to Makka Pakka who finds it very useful indeed.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Last to try his hand in Northamptonshire is managing director and proud northerner Carl Johnson, with a menu that includes gammon cooked in two litres of cola.

programme.desc: The mastermind of a series of bomb blasts wants to get rid of the officer investigating the case, so he hires an assassin who is an ex-convict and a former gangster.

programme.title: Gabbar Is Back
programme.desc: Gabbar creates a vigilante military network to eliminate corrupt officials. As pressure mounts on the police to find out who is responsible for the killings, a special investigator is summoned to track them down.

programme.title: Tridev
programme.desc: Police Inspector Karan Saxena is jailed while seeking out a gangster and smuggler who has caused havoc in the region.

programme.title: Bloody Daddy
programme.desc: A messed up and tenacious man faces off against cops and crime lords to save the one relationship that matters to him: the one with his son.

programme.title: Ganga Ki Saugand
programme.desc: When a cruel landowner, Jaswant Singh, assaults an old woman, her son, Jeeva, steps in to intervene, and is forced to leave the village. Years later he returns to execute revenge on Jaswant.

programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Is Late
programme.desc: When Rachels pregnancy goes beyond the expected delivery date, the pain makes her increasingly irritable and willing to try anything that might speed up the babys arrival. programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: When Nicks con-man father suddenly reappears, Jess tries her best to fix the two mens relationship, despite Nicks fears that hes being used.

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Nick is alarmed when he reads a piece of fiction submitted by one of Jesss night-school students. Convinced that the man is hiding a sinister secret, Nick goes undercover in the classroom to try to discover the truth.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Vanessa blames Mike when she finds out they were not invited to a neighbours party.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: When Vanessa gives Mike a history of their house for his birthday, they discover that a woman who once lived there over 100 years ago died upstairs.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: When Frank backs into Roberts police car, Debra decides that hes not a safe driver and that the kids cant travel in his car.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra hires a babysitter but becomes jealous of her popularity with the kids, and her plans to remedy the situation end in disaster.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray embarrasses Debra at a school auction, and worries about his wife taking revenge on him.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra is shocked to realise she wishes her mum was more like Marie.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: The longtime friendship between Mike and Ed is challenged when Eds pushy girlfriend, Wendi, thinks Outdoor Man store owner Ed and not Mike should be the face of the sporting goods store.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: When Mike and Boyd narrowly miss a sinkhole on the interstate, Boyd becomes petrified of leaving the house.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Blind Dates
programme.desc: Joey and Phoebe conspire to arrange awful dates for both Rachel and Ross, hoping that appreciation of their former relationship will push them back together. Meanwhile, the ovulating Monica wants to get intimate with Chandler.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey stumbles upon a way to impress a famous actor during an audition, Ross learns the identity of a long-ago mugger, and Chandler accepts an internship at a shoe company.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Boob Job
programme.desc: Monica secretly asks Joey for a loan because she and Chandler are strapped for cash, Phoebe invites her boyfriend to move in with her, and Rachels apartment baby-proofing drives Joey crazy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Memorial Service
programme.desc: When Chandler jokingly posts an outrageous biography about Ross on Ross college alumni website, Ross retaliates in kind, sparking an internet war. Meanwhile, Monica gets extremely vigilant after a weak-willed Phoebe asks for help to stop her from contacting Mike after their relationship ends.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Hoping to win a huge jackpot, the friends pool their money and buy dozens of lottery tickets, but they argue over how to spend the fortune if they win, and Monica irritates everyone else by buying tickets just for her and Chandler. Exasperated, Phoebe takes the bowl of everyones tickets and threatens to throw it off the balcony. The others make up, but a pigeon startles Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: A visit to the set of a soap opera inspires Rachel to dream of a romantic encounter with Joey, and Chandler must take Ross on a weekend getaway after Monica is unable to take time off from work.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Soap Opera Party
programme.desc: Ross is excited when he meets a stunning palaeontology professor, but when he takes her to Joeys rooftop party for the actors soap-opera co-stars, she intimidates him with her impressive list of former boyfriends. Meanwhile, Rachel and an intoxicated Monica make fools of themselves at the party chasing after the hunky daytime actors.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Fertility Test
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler have an embarrassing encounter with an old acquaintance at a fertility clinic, Ross plays Cyrano to help Joey woo a professor, and Rachel sneaks into a spa for a massage hoping Phoebe wont find out.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Disappointed to learn that they cannot conceive a baby naturally, Monica and Chandler consider their options. When Chandler invites a handsome colleague round for dinner, Monica and Chandler embarrassingly interview him as a potential sperm donor. Meanwhile, while shopping with Phoebe, Rachel admits that she still has a thing for Joey.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang heads to Barbados for a palaeontology convention where Ross is the keynote speaker. Rachel harbours steamy thoughts about Joey while David prepares to propose to Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After Joey and Rachel Kiss
programme.desc: While the friends are still in Barbados, Joey tries to tell Ross about his feelings for Rachel and Ross wants to confess to kissing Joeys girlfriend Charlie, but it is easier said than done. Meanwhile, Monica, Chandler and Phoebe can hear their amorous conversations through the hotels paper-thin walls. Also, Monicas hair problems go from bad to worse, and Phoebe has some bad news for Mikes girlfriend on her birthday.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Is Fine
programme.desc: Ross drinks too much wine while dining with Rachel, Joey and Charlie. Elsewhere, Frank Jr cannot cope with his precocious triplets and pays Phoebe a visit.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel and Joey nervously anticipate their first real date, Monica and Phoebe try to avoid an obnoxious friend with a fake British accent, and Ross emerges from a tanning booth with a two-toned appearance.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Michael McIntyres annual festive special returns, stuffed with big stars, big laughs and bigger surprises. Recorded at the Theatre Royal, Drury Lane, the night includes stand-up from Michael and live music from Welsh soprano Katherine Jenkins.

programme.sub-title: Metal Detector and Too Big to Fall
programme.desc: Beavis and Butt-Head use Mr. Andersons metal detector to find treasure. Middle-aged Butt-Head tries to avoid eviction by getting as fat as possible.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson and guests Vernon Kay, Tim Minchin, Joe Wilkinson and Rachel Riley, thrash out the hot stories of the week, from the silly to the serious.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson thrash out the hot stories of the week with guests Louie Spence, Joe Wilkinson, Elis James and Shappi Khorsandi.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Its an unprecedented view of young mothers facing the responsibilities of parenthood as their children enter kindergarten, start little league and reach other milestones of youth.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Its an unprecedented view of young mothers facing the responsibilities of parenthood as their children enter kindergarten, start little league and reach other milestones of youth.

programme.title: Shed and Buried

programme.desc: A look at Carly Simons 1972 album No Secrets explores its connections to the singer-songwriters life and work, from her relationships to the creative process of making each track.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: Blood for Dust
programme.desc: Travelling salesman Cliff is drowning under the weight of providing for his family and finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague who has a dark past. Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity, and inspired by Supermans selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater threat. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to recruit a team to stand against this newly-awakened enemy. Despite the formation of an unprecedented league of heroes in Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and the Flash, it may be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A half-human, half-vampire superhero hunts down the brutal bloodsucking creature who infected his mother.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

programme.title: William Tell

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: Boonie Bears: Guardian Code
programme.desc: Briar and Bramble lose their mother at a very young age under mysterious circumstances. Many years later, logger Vick takes the bears to visit the Robot Research Institute, and they uncover a clue relating to their mother.

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Swept into the sea during a family cruise, a young girl named Shenxiu stumbles upon a mysterious restaurant under the waves. There, she meets the scheming head chef and his ragtag crew of adorable otters and sarcastic walruses.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Flightless birds lead a mostly happy existence, except for Red, who just cant get past the daily annoyances of life. His temperament leads him to anger management class, where he meets fellow misfits Chuck and Bomb. Red becomes even more agitated when his feathered brethren welcome green pigs to their island paradise. As the swine begin to get under his skin, Red joins forces with Chuck and Bomb to investigate the real reason behind their mysterious arrival.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: A family of ducks decides to leave the safety of a New England pond for an adventurous trip to Jamaica. However, their well-laid plans quickly go awry when they get lost and wind up in New York City.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: Just as Gru settles into his new role as a suburban family man, the ultrasecret Anti-Villain League sends him on a mission to nab the perpetrator of a spectacular heist.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss the Lorax
programme.desc: A young boy searches for a way to gain the affections of his dream-girl. In his quest he learns that in order to succeed he must uncover the story of the grumpy but nature-loving Lorax.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Swede Caroline
programme.desc: As Caroline readies herself for the championship, the competitive giant vegetable-growing world is rocked by scandal. Her prized marrow plants are stolen, and her life turns upside down, so she hires two private detectives.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder

With such evidence somewhat lacking, Manions lawyer, Paul Biegler attempts to save his defendant from prosecution, setting his assistants in search of witnesses.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

programme.title: Funny Girl
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Fanny Brice, who rose from obscurity to become one of Americas most beloved entertainers.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: Funny Girl
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Fanny Brice, who rose from obscurity to become one of Americas most beloved entertainers.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writers imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything theyve faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Mollie is a pregnant woman whose partner has deserted her. When she goes into labour, friendly taxi driver James rushes her to hospital and the pair become firm friends. He slowly falls in love with her and her baby Mikey, but shes still looking for her perfect partner, not realising hes right under her nose. However we can hear Mikeys thoughts, and he wants James as his Dad.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Dreamer Max, ridiculed by his classmates, conjures up his perfect dreamworld - the Planet Drool, but his dream is more powerful than even he suspects, and his favourite dream superheroes, Sharkboy and Lavagirl, materialise on Earth. They bring news that an alien intelligence is threatening his beloved Planet Drool. Is it true, as Sharkboy and Lavagirl say, that only Max can stop it?

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Bridgets brand new relationship with Darcy has taken a plummet due to her jealousy of his workmate. Having previously left the publishing house she worked for to avoid her boss, Daniel, with whom she had an unsuccessful romance, she finds him along for the ride on her new job, which takes her to Thailand, and almost into his arms.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Romes Colosseum explodes, Londons pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planets core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earths engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.desc: An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: While trying to salvage her career, a disgraced journalist begins investigating a strange conspiracy theory. However, as the trail leads uncomfortably close to home, shes left to grapple with the lies at the heart of her own story.

programme.title: Arrival

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Extinction
programme.desc: Survivors of a global plague are besieged in Las Vegas. The Umbrella Corporation wants Alice for her DNA. If the scientists dont get her, the zombies will.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A seance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widows youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyones behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A seance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widows youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement, a former baseball player moves into a new house with his wife and two children. Soon, a dark secret from the homes past unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm `snuff films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: Parents take drastic measures when it seems their new home is haunted and their comatose son is possessed by a malevolent entity.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the towns children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the orders unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyones behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement, a former baseball player moves into a new house with his wife and two children. Soon, a dark secret from the homes past unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: Parents take drastic measures when it seems their new home is haunted and their comatose son is possessed by a malevolent entity.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: Parents take drastic measures when it seems their new home is haunted and their comatose son is possessed by a malevolent entity.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: In June 1980, a young Jason witnesses his murderous mothers beheading at Camp Crystal Lake. Three decades later, a group of friends arrive at the fateful spot on the hunt for marijuana. Jason soon reappears, picking off the careless youngsters one by one. However, the psychopath spares one girl named Whitney because she looks like his mother.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Gloria
programme.desc: The mob eliminates Jack Dawn and his family. His six year old son, Phil, escapes with Gloria, the girlfriend of one of the gangsters, but they are chased because of a book containing mop accounts.

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London.

programme.title: The Thicket
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter and a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer, they find themselves in a deadly no-mans-land known as the Thicket.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: Small-time crooks One Two and Mumbles decide to legitimately invest in some prime real estate and find themselves out of their depth and in debt to old-school London gangster Lenny Cole. Cole himself is in the middle of a business deal with a Russian gangster, but when his accountant tips off One Two and Mumbles to the details of an upcoming big-money business transaction, the two scallywags swoop in and steal the cash.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Thriller adapted from Thomas Harriss first Hannibal Lecter novel about an FBI profiler called out of retirement to help catch a serial killer nicknamed the Tooth Fairy. The agent has the uncanny ability to project himself into the minds of his criminal prey, but the case forces him to confront his past and consult his former nemesis - the now-incarcerated Dr Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: The famous ex-cop known as Shaft sets out to nail Walter Wade Jnr, a killer using his rich-kid connections to escape conviction, but as Shafts net draws tighter, he has to contend with killers employed by a desperate Wade.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russias first nuclear submarine and his executive officers first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.title: Gloria
programme.desc: The mob eliminates Jack Dawn and his family. His six year old son, Phil, escapes with Gloria, the girlfriend of one of the gangsters, but they are chased because of a book containing mop accounts.

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London.

programme.title: The Thicket
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter and a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer, they find themselves in a deadly no-mans-land known as the Thicket.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: Small-time crooks One Two and Mumbles decide to legitimately invest in some prime real estate and find themselves out of their depth and in debt to old-school London gangster Lenny Cole. Cole himself is in the middle of a business deal with a Russian gangster, but when his accountant tips off One Two and Mumbles to the details of an upcoming big-money business transaction, the two scallywags swoop in and steal the cash.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Thriller adapted from Thomas Harriss first Hannibal Lecter novel about an FBI profiler called out of retirement to help catch a serial killer nicknamed the Tooth Fairy. The agent has the uncanny ability to project himself into the minds of his criminal prey, but the case forces him to confront his past and consult his former nemesis - the now-incarcerated Dr Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: The famous ex-cop known as Shaft sets out to nail Walter Wade Jnr, a killer using his rich-kid connections to escape conviction, but as Shafts net draws tighter, he has to contend with killers employed by a desperate Wade.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russias first nuclear submarine and his executive officers first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Built by William the Conqueror, the Tower of London is one of Britains most iconic landmarks. It has been a military fortress, a palace, a royal mint, a prison, a zoo and a place of execution, a silent witness to some of the most momentous events in our history. Dan Jones reveals some of its fascinating secrets and tells the stories of the traitors, rebels and royalty who met their end inside its imposing walls.

programme.desc: The team prepare to release two beautiful and elusive spotted cats called servals. The plan goes awry when one escapes into the dangerous city of Lilongwe. Meanwhile, its all hands on deck when a baby monkey arrives in a critical condition.

programme.title: Natures Fastest Attacks
programme.desc: The worlds fastest predators can strike and kill in the blink an eye. Now, with the help modern high-speed cameras, witness these lightning-fast attacks in deadly detail.

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: A younger and stronger leopard challenges Kamuti for her territory - the Luangwa Valley, where she has reigned for ten years.

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: Seeing the world is one of the most amazing animal adaptations. Different types of eyes give animals different types of vision, and in some cases they can be extraordinary.

programme.title: Animal Senses
programme.desc: Sound waves are produced by movement. Animals have evolved organs to detect those sound waves in the air or water to perceive movements in their environment. This can be used to find prey, predators, and mates. These are some of the animals that have mastered the sense of hearing.

programme.title: Impossible Animals
programme.desc: Patrick Ayree examines the rainforest residents that have pushed their bodies to the limit, revealing some of the worlds most remarkable behaviours and adaptations.

programme.title: Age of Big Cats
programme.desc: Saber-tooths rule the Pleistocene Era but the arrival of the new cats, early snow leopards, cheetahs and jaguars, mark a turning point in the evolutionary track.

programme.title: Cub Camp
programme.desc: Get to know Winston, a tiny abandoned cub who imprints on Judy as she nurses him 24-7. Feel the heartbreak as she severs their emotional attachment and teaches this sweet little fellow how to be a grown-up, independent bear in the non-human world.

programme.title: Evolution Earth
programme.desc: Animals go to extraordinary lengths to survive in the hottest and driest extremes, from the Sahara Desert to Australia.

programme.title: Planet Weird
programme.desc: Watch the cannibalistic Portia spider devour the competition, uncover the bloodthirsty side of cuddly koalas and catch an epic giraffe battle.

programme.title: Blacklight

programme.title: Deadlock
programme.desc: A retired army ranger must save thousands of innocent lives when a rogue team of mercenaries brutally seizes an energy plant and holds everyone inside hostage.

programme.title: Worlds Most Evil Killers
